items.title: Notre Dame is in better than “striking” position for the playoff
items.summary: When Notre Dame started the season 0-2 it was hard for those outside of the ND bubble to imagine this team making the college football playoff. Obviously, at the time, there were huge caveats put in place like winning 10 straight, and if they would have any good wins at all. It was very rational […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2025-26 Week 10 Review of Win over Boston College
items.summary: Notre Dame football emerged from Week 10 of the 2025-26 season with a 25-10 over Boston College.  This victory places the team at 6-2 overall heading into the first release of College Football Playoff rankings.  Most of the fanbase expected this game to be an uneventful box to check off before seeing what the Committee […]

items.title: You probably won’t be able to watch Notre Dame VS Boston College on YouTube TV
items.summary: There’s a big college football weekend on deck, and it’s likely going to be wildly different for fans to watch the games as Disney has pulled ABC, ESPN, and Disney off of YouTube TV. Over the years, fans have grown acustomed to media contract negotiations happening during football season, and this year is no different. […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame is about to commit a Holy War crime
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan are back on the pod machine to help everyone with this Notre Dame Football crusade. The Irish are traveling east to take on Boston College in the Holy War, Frank Leahy Memorial Bowl, Lifetime Revenge, or whatever you want to call it. The boys cover the entire scope of the college […]
